## UpSet.js HTMLWidget in R Markdown

This is a simple example how to include the UpSet.js [HTMLWidget](http://www.htmlwidgets.org/) in your R Markdown file

```{r libraries}
devtools::install_github("rstudio/crosstalk")
# devtools::install_github("upsetjs/upsetjs_htmlwidget")

library(crosstalk)
library(upsetjs)
```

## Cross Talk

The UpSet.js HTMLWidget supports [Crosstalk](http://rstudio.github.io/crosstalk/) to sync selection and filtering among widgets.


```{r crosstalk_iris}
```
